structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 4. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] This chapter shall supersede the rule of the common law known as the rule against perpetuities.
